message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product has a high intrinsic value to me. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer reflects my desire to see the product in capable hands while ensuring a fair return on my investment. I look forward to hearing your response soon. Kind regards, Alice
